author: blair
msg: My trivial and minor comments and changes to the book.  Any issues
with the book that I didn't want to change myself I placed into the
* doc/book/REVIEW: New file contain book reviews and comments.
Use the word "copy" instead of "move" when files are imported into a
working copy, since the import doesn't delete the original file,
Add a \ for a sample command to get line wrapping correct.
Add deltify to the 'svnadmin help' output.
For the safe way to backup a repository, mention 'svnadmin hotcopy'
instead of copying and recopying the repository.
Put ""'s around variable names in the txn-info.sh sample script, as
Update 'svnadmin recover' output to match current behavior.
(Server Configuration): Mention that the file:// method is used to
access the repository on a local filesystem.
Use the -m command line option to htpasswd to use MD5 encryption of
the passwords instead of crypt(), which isn't as secure.
Make sure that all paths to the Apache passwd file are consistent.
To be consistent with the rest of the book where file extensions are

author: philip
msg: Fix a use of unitialised memory revealed by valgrind.

author: philip
msg: Fix a memory bug revealed by valgrind.
name must persist until the second open.

author: kfogel
msg: Merge many trunk changes into 1.0, remove them from STATUS.
Copyright notice fixes, like the {r8016, r8019, r8028} change.
Anchor/target split may use NULL for target.
apr_ and APR_ namespace symbols in Subversion
Approved by: jerenkrantz, ghudson, epg, striker
Approved by: No one, but given that we approved two changes (r8030
and r8127) that affect this file, I'm auto-approving
the revision that created it in the first place! :-)
Fixes to make 'svn blame' work with i18n and uri-escaped filenames.
Approved by: jerenkrantz, rooneg, jszakmeister, ghudson
Fix a handle leak that caused a test failure on Windows.
Approved by: brane, jerenkrantz, ghudson, dionisos, gstein, striker
'svn revert' performance improvement (timestamp sleep once, not N times)
Approved by: jerenkrantz, rooneg, ghudson, dionisos, epg, cmpilato, striker
Add may_save option to the auth prompt functions and credentials.
Approved by: jerenkrantz, bliss, ghudson, epg, sussman, striker
Approved by: bliss, ghudson, sussman, striker
Add prompting and retry count (at most 2) to SSL auth providers
Approved by: jerenkrantz, bliss, ghudson, epg
Update references to BDB version in documentation.
Approved by: jerenkrantz, rooneg, ghudson, dionisos, gstein, striker
Error messages cf most important conventions.
Approved by: jerenkrantz, jszakmeister, epg, cmpilato
Add a pool parameter to finish_abort and abort_report.
Approved by: jerenkrantz, ghudson, bliss, jszakmeister, epg,
Approved by: jerenkrantz, rooneg, jszakmeister, epg
Load RA modules as foo-MAJOR.so.0 instead of foo-MAJOR.so.
Approved by: bliss, cmpilato, sussman, striker
Fix bug in unexercised part of status editor
Fix bugs in update with specified target
Approved by: ghudson, jszakmeister, gstein, epg
Document reporter requirements and require depth-first.
Approved by: mbk, ghudson, dionisos, jszakmeister, gstein, epg,
Approved by: mbk, rooneg, jszakmeister, cmpilato
Fix a small bug in the FS history harvesting code.
Approved by: cmpilato, jerenkrantz, jszakmeister, striker
Fix a doc bug in svn_client.h.
Approved by: ghudson, kfogel, dlr, striker
RPM Documentation build patch and added svnserve.conf and snvserve man
pages.  Also require correct apr/apr-util, and apache RPM versions.
Improved signal handling for svnadmin, svnlook and svn
Approved by: bliss, rooneg, ghudson, striker
Fix major memleak in mod_dav_svn: use a subpool during REPORT parsing
Fix for bindings build on Windows.
Approved by: brane, jerenkrantz, gstein, striker
Add --enable-swig-bindings option to select build targets included
